text: Odbojkaški klub Vojvodina () is a professional volleyball team based in Novi Sad, Serbia. It plays in the Wiener Städtische League. ==Honours and achievements== National Championships - 17 *Champion of Yugoslavia (2): **1987-88, 1988–89 * Runners up (5): 1980/81, 1982/83, 1985/86, 1986/87, 1990/91 *Champion of Serbia and Montenegro (10): **1991-92, 1992–93, 1993–94, 1994–95, 1995–96, 1996–97, 1997–98, 1998–99, 1999-00, 2003–04 * Runners up (3): 2001/02, 2004/05, 2005/06 *Champion of Serbia (5): **2006-07, 2016/17, 2017/18, 2018/19, 2019/20 * Runners up (5): 2008/09, 2010/11, 2011/12, 2013/14, 2015/16 National Cups - 15 *Yugoslav Cup (2): **1977, 1987 * Runners up (5): 1981, 1986, 1988, 1990, 1991 *Serbia and Montenegro Cup (8): **1991/92, 1993/94, 1994/95, 1995/96, 1997/98, 2002/03, 2003/04, 2004/05 * Runners up (2): 1992/93, 2000/01 *Serbian cup (5): **2006/07, 2009/10, 2011/12, 2014/15, 2019/20 * Runners up (1): 2016/17 National Super Cups - 4 *Serbia and Montenegro Super cup (1): **1993 *Serbian Super cup (3): **2015, 2019, 2020 * Runners up (3): 2012, 2017, 2018 ===International=== *CEV Champions League: **Semi finalist (2): 1988/89, 1995/96 *CEV Cup: **Semi finalist (2): 1982/83, 2005/06 *CEV Challenge Cup: **Winner (1): 2014/15 ==Team roster–season
